front.title: Reoptimization of Point-to-Multipoint Traffic Engineering Loosely Routed LSPs

abstract.t: This document defines signaling extensions to Resource Reservation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) for reoptimizing loosely routed point-to-multipoint (P2MP) Traffic Engineered (TE) Label Switched Path (LSP) in an Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) and Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) networks.
